text: Purplebeck (), sometimes written as Purple Beck, is a South Korean girl group formed by Majesty Entertainment. They made their debut on June 24, 2019, with the extended play, Crystal Ball. The group is composed of five members: Yeowool, Yerim, Layeon, Mini, and Seyeon. ==Discography== ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="1" style="width:5em;" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- !
